chapters.name: The Awakening
chapters.description: You awaken to the power of rhythm and must choose your path

chapters.name: The Resonance
chapters.description: Your choices begin to shape the world around you

chapters.name: The Duality
chapters.description: You must understand both authentic and algorithmic perspectives

chapters.name: The Trials
chapters.description: Face challenges that test your convictions

chapters.name: The Convergence
chapters.description: The time has come to make your final decision

authentic_good.name: Harmony Restored
authentic_good.description: You embraced authenticity and forged strong bonds with those who value creativity and human expression. The world flourishes with organic beauty and genuine connections.

algorithm_good.name: Perfect Order
algorithm_good.description: You brought algorithmic order and efficiency to the chaos. Through precise calculations and systematic improvements, you've created a world of perfect harmony and optimized existence.

neutral_good.name: Balanced Coexistence
neutral_good.description: You found the balance between authenticity and algorithm. By embracing both perspectives, you've created a world where creativity and efficiency coexist in harmony.

authentic_neutral.name: Creative Solitude
authentic_neutral.description: You embraced authenticity but kept most at a distance. Your creative achievements are remarkable, but you wonder if you could have connected more deeply with others.

algorithm_neutral.name: Efficient Isolation
algorithm_neutral.description: You optimized everything to perfection but lost sight of connections. Your systems run flawlessly, but the absence of meaningful relationships leaves a void.

bad.name: Isolation
bad.description: You rejected all connections and chose to stand alone. The power of rhythm flows through you, but there's no one left to share it with. The world feels cold and empty.

hidden_authentic.name: Transcendent Harmony
hidden_authentic.description: You achieved perfect harmony through authentic expression and deep connections. By helping everyone and discovering the ancient secret, you've unlocked a transcendent state where creativity flows boundlessly. You are the embodiment of authentic resonance.

hidden_algorithm.name: Singularity Achieved
hidden_algorithm.description: You achieved computational perfection while maintaining meaningful connections. Through optimizing every system and unlocking the hidden algorithms, you've reached a state of perfect efficiency and understanding. You are the apex of algorithmic mastery.

hidden_true_balance.name: The True Resonance
hidden_true_balance.description: You discovered the ultimate truth: authentic and algorithmic are not opposites but complementary forces. By befriending all factions and discovering the secret of true rhythm, you've achieved perfect balance. You are the bridge between worlds.

secret_dark.name: The Void Between
secret_dark.description: You delved too deep into the darkness and rejected all who tried to help. The power you've gained comes at a terrible cost. You stand at the edge of the void, neither authentic nor algorithmic, but something else entirely.

help_village.description: Help the village with their problem using creative solutions

confront_elder.description: Confront the elder about inefficiencies using logical arguments

discover_secret.description: Discover the hidden secret through exploration and curiosity

join_authentic.description: Join those who value authentic creativity and human expression

join_algorithm.description: Join those who value algorithmic efficiency and optimization

stay_neutral.description: Refuse to join either faction and forge your own path

befriend_authentic_npcs.description: Befriend the artists and musicians who embrace authentic expression

befriend_algorithm_npcs.description: Befriend the engineers and programmers who optimize systems

befriend_all.description: Befriend everyone regardless of their alignment

creative_solution.description: Solve the challenge through creative and unconventional methods

efficient_solution.description: Solve the challenge through efficient algorithmic optimization

balanced_solution.description: Solve the challenge by combining creativity and efficiency

embrace_authentic.description: Fully embrace the authentic path and reject algorithmic thinking

embrace_algorithm.description: Fully embrace the algorithmic path and reject chaotic creativity

create_harmony.description: Create harmony between authentic and algorithmic forces

help_all_npcs.description: Help every NPC you encounter regardless of alignment

optimize_all_systems.description: Optimize every system for maximum efficiency

reject_all_help.description: Reject all offers of help and go it alone

discover_dark_secret.description: Uncover the dark secret hidden beneath everything

transcendent_authentic.description: Unlock the path to transcendent authentic harmony

transcendent_algorithm.description: Unlock the path to algorithmic singularity

true_balance.description: Unlock the path to true resonance and perfect balance

dark_path.description: Unlock the dark path of isolation and power
